subject: Golf
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Shanshan Feng shot a 5-under 67 on Sunday to win the L.P.G.A. Championship by two shots, her first victory on the Tour and the first for a player from China.
snippet: Shanshan Feng shot a 5-under 67 on Sunday to win the L.P.G.A. Championship by two shots, her first victory on the Tour and the first for a player from China.
